Colors.value: (blue: $blue, indigo: $indigo, purple: $purple, pink: $pink, red: $red, orange: $orange, yellow: $yellow, green: $green, teal: $teal, cyan: $cyan, white: $white, gray: $gray-600, gray-dark:  $gray-800)
(primary: $primary, secondary: $secondary, success: $success, info: $info, warning: $warning, danger: $danger, light: $light, dark: $dark)
